thread.section_title: Dresslily 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslily 的点评意见 | dresslily.com
thread.title: Mandy Roe
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 Mandy Roe

author: Mandy Roe
title: Mandy Roe
text: I just received my very first order from Dresslily and I am very pleased. My order took about a month total time to get to me, but I do understand that as the company is overseas. I will be using this site again. Due to the high amount of questionable reviews I will likely only spend a trivial amount on each purchase, but my own experience has been quite positive. :)
